title: However, in congested area, if the original land holding is more than 0
clause_text: However, in congested area, if the original land holding is more than 0.40 Hectare, then regulations of non-congested area, except FSI, shall apply. FSI in such cases shall be as per the Regulation No.6.1.1

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
